section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Renewable fuel" means gaseous, liquid, or solid fuel from any organic matter and its by-products.
"Renewable fuel" does not include fossil fuel.

"Transportation facility" means a transportation facility that is used exclusively to transport fuel produced by a fuel production facility to:
a storage facility;
a pipeline connection to an existing pipeline or processing facility; or
an area near the fuel production facility.
